sub_title: Lecturer / Researcher Logistics @ Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences
summary:
Lecturer  & researcher with a focus on sustainable logistics.

Background: PhD in sustainable transport policy from Erasmus University Rotterdam; Master's degrees in International Economics & Business (cum laude) and Modern History & International Relations (cum laude) from the University of Groningen.

profile_positions.description:
Lecturer Master Shipping & Transport - Research skills and methodology education; research case and thesis supervision

Researcher Smart Logistics & Maritime Innovation - Focus on greening port and hinterland logistics
profile_positions.title: Lecturer / Researcher Logistics

profile_positions.description: Acquiring, leading, and conducting applied research projects on food and biomaterials supply chains, with a focus on sustainability and circularity. Worked with a variety of clients and partners from industry, government, and IGO/NGOs.
profile_positions.title: Scientist / Project Leader Supply Chain Development

profile_positions.description:
Effective use of reefer containers through the Port of Rotterdam - A transition oriented approach. 

In cooperation with TU Delft, Wageningen University & Research, and companies in the Port of Rotterdam and the (fresh) logistics sector.

Teaching: Statistics, SPSS, Economics, Internship Supervision, Academic Writing, and Project Management. Main lecturer and course coordinator for BSc course Economics.
profile_positions.title: PhD Candidate / Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Summer courses 2019 and 2020. Responsible for development and delivery of Quantitative Research Methods course, teaching Master students the basics of statistics and data analysis with SPSS. Tasks included: 
- Developing instruction material (lectures and step-by-step guides)
- Delivering lectures and advising students in computer practical setting
- Grading research papers and providing feedback to students
- Re-developing and delivering the course in a 'remote learning' format during summer 2020, including preparation of video lectures, conducting virtual working group sessions, advising students remotely, and curating online resources for students
profile_positions.title: Instructor Research Methods & Techniques (summer course)

profile_positions.description: Supporting the Permanent Representation by helping prepare, participating in, and reporting on various meetings and working groups at the OECD, the International Transport Forum, the International Energy Agency, and the Nuclear Energy Agency.
profile_positions.title: Intern at Permanent Representation of the Netherlands to the OECD

profile_positions.description: Student representative in the programme board of the Research Master Modern History and International Relations.
profile_positions.title: Student member of Programme Board

profile_positions.description:
Research internship with Prof. Stig Tenold and Prof. Jan Tore Klovland. Research into interwar shipping markets (1920-1939), focusing on freight rate developments and the links between maritime freight markets and global trade. 

While working on my research internship, I took courses in Maritime History & Economics and Norwegian at NHH.
profile_positions.title: Research Intern

profile_positions.description: Tutoring of high school students, help with preparation for final exams in the subjects History, Economics, Spanish, and Dutch.
profile_positions.title: Tutor

profile_positions.description:
- Compiling and editing articles from experts in their (historical) fields for publication in historical journal. 
- Initiation and management of adoption of 'open access' publishing format
- Responsible for fundraising and advertisements.
- Editor-in-chief of issue 199 "Kapitaal, Krediet en Crisis" on themes in contemporary economic history
profile_positions.title: Editor

profile_positions.description: Member of the daily board of Groningen Students Rowing Club 'Aegir'. Responsible for the club's accomodation and equipment, including purchase, maintenance and allocation of racing shells, equipment and indoor training facilities.
profile_positions.title: Board Member
